<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=1535)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 332 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 ally and 1 enemy
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The status bonus increases to +2.
name: Forbidding Ward
